Short-term stays for seniors

When life happens, lean on Charter Senior Living of Linden.

If you’re an at-home caregiver who’s temporarily unable to care for your loved one or simply in need of relief, Short-Term Stays can be the solution you’re looking for. Or maybe you’d like to give senior living a test run before making a long-term commitment. Short-Term Stays can help you with that, too.

Our convenient and comfortable Short-Term Stays provide all the amenities and senior care services that are offered to Charter residents, including:

  • Nursing Care
  • Three meals per day and unlimited snacks
  • Weekly housekeeping and laundry services
  • Fully furnished apartments
  • Access to all community amenities

Whatever your need may be, let Charter Senior Living be your backup plan.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjExNiJ9fQ==@" button_text="Discover All Services & Amenities" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.16" _dynamic_attributes="button_url" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#212d65" button_bg_color="#FFFFFF" button_border_color="#212D65" custom_margin="30px||||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="||||false|false" button_text_size_tablet="" button_text_size_phone="18px" button_text_size_last_edited="on|phone" button_border_color_tablet="" button_border_color_phone="" button_border_color_last_edited="on|desktop" locked="off" global_colors_info="{}" button_border_color__hover_enabled="on|desktop" button_border_color__hover="#212D65" theme_builder_area="post_content"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="2_5" _builder_version="4.16" _module_preset="default" background_color="#e1e1e1" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_text content_tablet="

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.16" _module_preset="default" custom_padding="0px||0px|||" da_disable_devices="off|off|off" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" use_custom_gutter="on" gutter_width="1" make_equal="on" custom_padding_last_edited="on|tablet" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" width="100%" max_width="9999px" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="0px||80px||false|false" custom_padding_tablet="0px||0px||false|false" custom_padding_phone="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" background_image="https://charteroflinden.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/65/2022/09/iStock-1313904349-scaled.jpg" custom_css_main_element="min-height:666px!important;||margin:auto!important;" global_colors_info="{}" custom_css_main_element_last_edited="on|phone" custom_css_main_element_phone="min-height:300px!important;" custom_css_main_element_tablet="min-height:666px!important;||margin:auto!important;" theme_builder_area="post_content"][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" background_color="#edf7f6" custom_padding="5%|5%|5%|5%|true|true" custom_padding_tablet="7%|7%|7%|7%|true|true" custom_padding_phone="10%|6%|10%|6%|true|true" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_css_main_element="margin:auto;" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.18.0" _module_preset="default" text_line_height="1.9em" header_2_line_height="1.3em" header_2_font_size_tablet="21px" header_2_font_size_phone="18px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"]

Reliable Respite Care For Your Loved One

Your loved one will be in the best of hands during their Short-Term Respite Care visit, no matter the length of their stay. Currently, all Charter Senior Living communities require a minimum stay of two weeks (14 days), while most other Short-Term Stays senior care communities require a minimum of 30 days.

Don’t count on unreliable home care agencies or home health aides or feel pressured to make a quick decision about the rest of your or your loved one’s life. Because we want seniors and caregivers alike to feel cared for and seen, our Short-Term Stays care services create less worry and allow everyone to spend time making the right decision for the future. Learn more about our care plans today.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url="@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEyMzk0In19@" button_text="View Our Lifestyles" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.17.4" _dynamic_attributes="button_url" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#212d65" button_bg_color="#FFFFFF" button_border_color="#212D65" custom_margin="30px||||false|false" custom_margin_last_edited="off|desktop" custom_padding="||||false|false" button_text_size_tablet="" button_text_size_phone="18px" button_text_size_last_edited="on|phone" button_border_color_tablet="" button_border_color_phone="" button_border_color_last_edited="on|desktop" global_colors_info="{}" button_border_color__hover_enabled="on|desktop" button_border_color__hover="#212D65" theme_builder_area="post_content"][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" background_color="#212D65" custom_margin="0px||0px||true|false" custom_padding="30px||30px||true|false" da_disable_devices="off|off|off" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.16" _module_preset="default" custom_margin="||||false|false" custom_padding="||||false|false" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="4.16" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" text_text_color="#ffffff" text_line_height="1.9em" header_2_line_height="1.3em" header_2_font_size_tablet="21px" header_2_font_size_phone="18px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"]

It’s important to find senior Respite Care you can trust. Come visit our community to see for yourself how we serve residents with heart, purpose and courage. If you’re ready to try out senior living or are unable to care for a loved one, we’ve got your back like a loyal family member. Our Respite Care services make life easier on everyone.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url="#RFI" button_text="Schedule a Tour" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion closed_toggle_background_color="#edf7f6" _builder_version="4.18.0" _module_preset="default" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_font="|700||on|||||" toggle_font_size="26px" toggle_line_height="1.3em" body_line_height="1.9em" width="100%" max_width="9999%" toggle_font_size_tablet="21px" toggle_font_size_phone="18px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" global_colors_info="{}" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_accordion_item title="What is Respite Care?" open="on" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content"]Respite Care, or Short-Term Stays, is a temporary solution for seniors and caregivers where guests are provided with the same care services and amenities as permanent community residents.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Does Medicare cover Respite Care?" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]

If outside services (such as rehabilitation) are needed during a resident’s Short-Term Stay, Medicare coverage would be available to qualifying patients.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Who pays for Respite Care?" _builder_version="4.18.0" _module_preset="default" body_ul_item_indent="45px" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]Charter Senior Living of Linden will bill the resident’s family directly for rent and services provided during the resident's Short-Term Stay.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="How many hours of Respite Care are you allowed?" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]

The minimum Short-Term Stay at all Charter communities is two weeks (14 days). The maximum Short-Term Stay length is 30 days.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="How much does Respite Care cost?" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]

Short-Term Stays and Respite Care begin at an average of $200/day, depending on the specific Charter community and the care your loved one needs during their stay. Our rates range from $200–$275/day and vary for Assisted Living and Memory Care services.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Who needs Respite Care?" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]

Respite Care is temporary elderly care for those who are thinking of moving to a senior living community or for caregivers who are temporarily unable to care for loved ones and are therefore seeking a reliable source of care. Respite Care can also be used by those who need short-term skilled nursing or rehabilitation post-surgery or illness.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Are there minimum stay requirements for a Short-Term Stay?" _builder_version="4.18.0" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}" toggle_text_color="#212d65" toggle_level="h2" toggle_font="Cormorant Garamond|700|||||||" toggle_font_size="21px" toggle_font_size_tablet="18px" toggle_font_size_phone="16px" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|tablet" theme_builder_area="post_content" open="off"]

Most senior living communities require a minimum stay of 30 days. At Charter Senior Living of Linden, we only require a minimum of two weeks (14 days). Rest assured that no matter the length of your or your loved one’s stay, care is provided at an exceptional level.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
